name: Meat Loaf
associated_acts: Stoney & Meatloaf  '''Michael Lee Aday''' (born '''Marvin Lee Aday'''; September 27, 1947 – January 20, 2022), better known as '''Meat Loaf''', was an American singer and actor. He was noted for his powerful, wide-ranging voice and theatrical live shows. His ''Bat Out of Hell'' trilogy—''Bat Out of Hell'', ''Bat Out of Hell II: Back into Hell'', and ''Bat Out of Hell III: The Monster Is Loose''—has sold more than 65 million albums worldwide.<ref name
